title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8201 - State Assistance For The Maintenance Of A System Of Improved Real Property Tax Administration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8201 - State Assistance For The Maintenance Of A System Of Improved Real Property Tax Administration

State Regulations

Subpart 8201-3 - Assessment Rolls With Taxable Status Dates Occurring On Or After March 1, 2010 (§ 8201-3.1 to 8201-3.6)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8201

Statutory authority: Real Property Tax Law, §§ 201[1], 202[1][k], [l], 1573[l] [2], art. 15-B; L. 2010, ch. 56, parts W, Y
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
